gameDetails.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles â€“ Character Add-On Deck
gameDetails.description:
Hire a Bigger Crew!

Add more players and character options to your Skull & Shackles Base Set with the Skull & Shackles Character Add-On Deck. Inside this 110-card expansion deck you’ll find four new classes for Pathfinder Adventure Card Game characters—including 3 all-new ones: Alchemist, Warpriest, and Witch—along with all the additional cards you need to expand your adventures for 5 or 6 players. New monsters, items, and more give you everything you need to face even the deadliest challenges.
